I am Marta Quill. Lunch stole my life in 2014.

At 12:37 PM, my fiance left his desk for a "quick falafel" and came back with a hobby, a smile, and no urgency. I founded this firm to establish what your instincts already know: scheduled lunch is a hostile interruption against productive people.

We do not hate food. We hate the ritualized noon amnesia that turns sharp teams into breadcrumb philosophers.
